Posts.Content: Jun 25, 2018 09:06AM Summer9125 wrote: Hi there, I know the feeling- I had a terrible time with food tastes, smells, and nausea in general. The thing that really worked for me, which I wish I had discovered sooner, was sweet potatoes. They almost completely obliterated my nausea, and after eating a few bites of sweet potato, I was able to eat anything else I wanted. I don't know if the food taste thing is a side effect of nausea or if the chemo also has a direct effect on the taste buds - it may be both. Hang in there, it'll pass... Best, Summer
Posts.Title: Making food taste better GrooGruxQueen Frog-on-the-lilypad
